blocks.subject: Energy Issues
text: Everything is going great over here.  We're really busy.  Come on over some
time and we'll give you the grand tour.  The varsity is on the 11th floor
I caught the tail end of Wild At Heart last Sunday on the IFC channel ...
always awsome.  I got a satellite dish for my Father's Day present and
picked up some new channels including the Independent Film Channel and the

blocks.subject: Whazzup?
text: Mr.  Cook,  How is life at AEP?  The big E is still the same.  Minus
about 4 attorneys who decided to join you.
